	<title>Nationwide Corporate Training Programs | Center for Accelerated Learning</title>
	<meta name="description" content="The Center for Accelerated Learning is a worldwide leader in learner-driven "train-the-trainer" workshops for corporations of all sizes. We give trainers the tools they need to produce results-driven training programs that are engaging and cost-effective through Accelerated Learning." />

<div id="header-content" class="section-blue">
	<div class="ctr">
		<h1>Next level corporate training & educational programs</h1>
<p>The Center for Accelerated Learning is a worldwide leader in learner-driven and activity-based train-the-trainer workshops for corporations, nonprofits and entities of all sizes. With Accelerated Learning we give trainers the tools to speed training time, reduce costs, activate learners and improve learning results that will reach far beyond the training room. Our workshops will enable you to produce results-driven corporate training programs that are engaging, effective and that lead to increased productivity. Register for one of our face-to-face or online workshops today and take learner engagement to the next level!</p>
	</div>
</div>    <main id="page">
    <div class="ctr">    	<div id="hp-row" class="row">
    		<div class="grid-6 md-grid-12">
        		<h2>Accelerated learning workshops make an impact</h2>
<p>Our <strong>activity-based</strong>, <strong>learner-driven</strong> approach will enable you to…</p>
<ul>
<li>Design activity-based employee training programs in half the time</li>
<li>Fully activate employees using the latest learning techniques</li>
<li>Improve the speed and efficiency of your training programs</li>
<li>Fully engage employees as the architects of their own learning</li>
<li>Dramatically improve employee effectiveness and job performance</li>
<li>Teach with less stress and more success</li>
</ul>
        	</div>
        	<div class="grid-6 md-grid-12 hp-testimonial">
        		
<section class="testimonial">
	<div class="ctr">
		<div class="row">
						<a href="https://www.alcenter.com/about-us/testimonials/" class="grid-12 testimonial-container">

				<div class="grid-12 quote-text">
					<p><span style="font-size: 18pt;">"This is without question the best training workshop I have ever attended in my entire career."
</span></p>
					<div class="pointer"></div>
				</div>
				<div class="grid-6 xs-grid-12 quote-credit">
				    <p style="text-align: left;"><strong>PAT REISINGER</strong></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">HP</p>
				</div>
				<div class="grid-6 xs-grid-12 quote-img">
					<img src="https://www.alcenter.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/hp-logo.png" alt="">
				</div>
			</a>
					</div>
	</div>
</section>        	</div>
        </div>
                </div>
</main>    
<section id="design-model">
	<h2 class="line-through">Accelerated learning 4-phase design model</h2>
	<div class="ctr">
		<p>The Accelerated Learning 4-Phase Design Model is a sequence of activities designed to arouse learner interest, create positive encounters with the learning material, present methods for practice of newly learned material and provide steps for implementation that will last beyond the training room.</p>

		
		<div class="row design-row">

		
			<div class="grid-3 sm-grid-6 xs-grid-12 design-container">

									<a href="https://www.alcenter.com/design-model/#preparation" class="design-link">
				
						<figure>

							<img src="https://www.alcenter.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/phase-one.png" alt="" />

							<figcaption>
								<h6>Preparation</h6>

								
								
								<h6 class="phase-adjective">Arousal</h6>

								
															</figcaption>

						</figure>

									</a>
				
			</div>

		
			<div class="grid-3 sm-grid-6 xs-grid-12 design-container">

									<a href="https://www.alcenter.com/design-model/#presentation" class="design-link">
				
						<figure>

							<img src="https://www.alcenter.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/phase-two.png" alt="" />

							<figcaption>
								<h6>Presentation</h6>

								
								
								<h6 class="phase-adjective">Encounter</h6>

								
															</figcaption>

						</figure>

									</a>
				
			</div>

		
			<div class="grid-3 sm-grid-6 xs-grid-12 design-container">

									<a href="https://www.alcenter.com/design-model/#practice" class="design-link">
				
						<figure>

							<img src="https://www.alcenter.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/phase-three.png" alt="" />

							<figcaption>
								<h6>Practice</h6>

								
								
								<h6 class="phase-adjective">Integration</h6>

								
															</figcaption>

						</figure>

									</a>
				
			</div>

		
			<div class="grid-3 sm-grid-6 xs-grid-12 design-container">

									<a href="https://www.alcenter.com/design-model/#performance" class="design-link">
				
						<figure>

							<img src="https://www.alcenter.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/phase-four.png" alt="" />

							<figcaption>
								<h6>Performance</h6>

								
								
								<h6 class="phase-adjective">Application</h6>

								
															</figcaption>

						</figure>

									</a>
				
			</div>

		
		</div>

			</div>
</section>

/* <![CDATA[ */
 gform.initializeOnLoaded( function() { jQuery(document).on('gform_post_render', function(event, formId, currentPage){if(formId == 4) {if(typeof Placeholders != 'undefined'){
                        Placeholders.enable();
                    }} } );jQuery(document).on('gform_post_conditional_logic', function(event, formId, fields, isInit){} ) } ); 
/* ]]> */
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
/* <![CDATA[ */
 gform.initializeOnLoaded( function() {jQuery(document).trigger("gform_pre_post_render", [{ formId: "4", currentPage: "1", abort: function() { this.preventDefault(); } }]);        if (event && event.defaultPrevented) {                return;        }        const gformWrapperDiv = document.getElementById( "gform_wrapper_4" );        if ( gformWrapperDiv ) {            const visibilitySpan = document.createElement( "span" );            visibilitySpan.id = "gform_visibility_test_4";            gformWrapperDiv.insertAdjacentElement( "afterend", visibilitySpan );        }        const visibilityTestDiv = document.getElementById( "gform_visibility_test_4" );        let postRenderFired = false;        function triggerPostRender() {            if ( postRenderFired ) {                return;            }            postRenderFired = true;            gform.core.triggerPostRenderEvents( 4, 1 );            if ( visibilityTestDiv ) {                visibilityTestDiv.parentNode.removeChild( visibilityTestDiv );            }        }        function debounce( func, wait, immediate ) {            var timeout;            return function() {                var context = this, args = arguments;                var later = function() {                    timeout = null;                    if ( !immediate ) func.apply( context, args );                };                var callNow = immediate && !timeout;                clearTimeout( timeout );                timeout = setTimeout( later, wait );                if ( callNow ) func.apply( context, args );            };        }        const debouncedTriggerPostRender = debounce( function() {            triggerPostRender();        }, 200 );        if ( visibilityTestDiv && visibilityTestDiv.offsetParent === null ) {            const observer = new MutationObserver( ( mutations ) => {                mutations.forEach( ( mutation ) => {                    if ( mutation.type === 'attributes' && visibilityTestDiv.offsetParent !== null ) {                        debouncedTriggerPostRender();                        observer.disconnect();                    }                });            });            observer.observe( document.body, {                attributes: true,                childList: false,                subtree: true,                attributeFilter: [ 'style', 'class' ],            });        } else {            triggerPostRender();        }    } ); 
/* ]]> */
</script>

</html>
data.text:
Accelerated learning workshops make an impact
Our activity-based, learner-driven approach will enable you to…
- Design activity-based employee training programs in half the time
- Fully activate employees using the latest learning techniques
- Improve the speed and efficiency of your training programs
- Fully engage employees as the architects of their own learning
- Dramatically improve employee effectiveness and job performance
- Teach with less stress and more success
Connect With Us
